Question: PACCAR CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
PACCAR CES 2024

- PACCAR is showcasing its next generation of commercial vehicles at CES 2024, including industry-leading battery electric and hydrogen fuel cell electric vehicles.
- The Kenworth T680 FCEV and hydrogen fuel cell powered Peterbilt Model 579 offer zero emissions heavy-duty operations with up to a 450-mile range, and have received over 150 paid deposits with customer deliveries commencing in 2025.
- The Peterbilt SuperTruck II features an advanced clean diesel engine with waste heat recovery, a 48-volt mild hybrid powertrain, electrified engine accessories, and enhanced aerodynamics.
- The DAF XD Battery Electric truck is designed for urban and suburban transport, delivering up to 310 miles on a single charge, with 325 kW fast charging capabilities.
- PACCAR Parts will showcase DC fast chargers available for Kenworth, Peterbilt, and DAF electric vehicles, strategically covering PACCARâ€™s full range of electric vehicles.
- PACCAR is a global technology leader in the design, manufacture, and customer support of high-quality light-, medium-, and heavy-duty trucks under the Kenworth, Peterbilt, and DAF nameplates.

For more information, visit https://www.paccar.com/.
